articles.title: “Not True”: Rafael Nadal Disregards Rusty Relationship With Nick Kyrgios - EssentiallySports
articles.description: World No.2 Rafael Nadal refuses to accept a bitter relationship with Nick Kyrgios, believes it is something that is created by the media.
articles.content: World No.2 Rafael Nadal is enjoying stardom at the moment. It is as if all the journalists want to enquire about the Spaniard’s life and his relationships with other players. Rafa shares friendly rel… [+2146 chars]
